external_games.name: Five Nights at Sonic's Maniac Mania

name: Five Nights at Sonic's Maniac Mania
storyline:
Maniac Mania happens in an arcade machine created by Dr Golden in 2030, the protagonist in this arcade game is Luigi, Lefty Sonic, a female clone of sonic, is on the game too.

A nightmare version of Luigi, which can read Luigi's mind, is on the game, which he creates Nightmaric, which is a black sonic with tentacles, when we complete all max mode challenge, we have an interview with Dr Golden, also the one we are controlling the arcade not Luigi.
summary: Five Nights at Sonic's Maniac Mania is fan game made by SmilerFurcifier/PyroTheRapidFox, it is based of FNaF and it is a UCN.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Five Nights at Sonic's: Maniac Mania(Full Game).
